articles.author: Mike DeBonis, Seung Min Kim
articles.title: Biden-senate-voting - The Washington Post
articles.description: The senator from Arizona outlined her views just before President Biden arrived on Capitol Hill to push for action.
articles.content: But the circumstances in which she reiterated it as Senate Democratic leaders prepared to launch a decisive floor debate and less than an hour before President Biden arrived on Capitol Hill to deliveâ€¦ [+12257 chars]
